verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's sunshine in my soul today, More glorious and bright Than glows in any earthly sky, For Jesus is my light.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: O there's sunshine, blessed sunshine, When the peaceful, happy moments roll; When Jesus shows His smiling face, There is sunshine in my soul.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There's music in my soul today, A carol to my King, And Jesus, listening, can hear The songs I cannot sing.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There's springtime in my soul today, For, when the Lord is near, The dove of peace sings in my heart, The flow'rs of grace appear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There's gladness in my soul today, And hope and praise and love, For blessings which He gives me now, For joys "laid up above."
